entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 5:30 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 69 %
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming light before morning. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Drizzle ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
